title: Diamond 2 Adc LFT OOL [Diamond+ Team]
body:
Best picks: {{champion:110}} , {{champion:42}} , {{champion:202}} , {{champion:51}} , {{champion:21}} , {{champion:81}}

Thanks!

replies.body: hey man, add IGN: Best Anivia Oce :)
